sub_title: Sr. Water Management Expert and Environmental Expert at TERRAQUA
summary:
Frank de Zanger is a Water Management Expert and an Environmental (Safeguard) Expert. He has built up considerable experience in both fields and was involved in a large number of water and environmental projects, both overseas as well as in The Netherlands.

In his assignments as Environmental Expert he carried out Environmental Impact Assessments (EIA’s) for irrigation/agricultural dev, flood protection, drainage, waterway improvements, water supply, sanitation, highway & railway systems, port & harbour developments, and waste disposal (Vietnam, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Nepal, Egypt, Ethiopia, Ivory Coast, Tanzania, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Poland, Russian Federation). Furthermore, he was involved in the preparation of the National Environmental Action Plan for Palestine.

As Water Management Expert, he has been responsible for water resources investigations, IWRM studies, water quality studies, groundwater and irrigation dev, and urban and rural water supply studies (Indonesia, Malaysia, Bangladesh, India, Philippines, Malawi, Mozambique, Nigeria, Trinidad, Samoa).

Drs. de Zanger worked as team member on the Integrated Water Resources Management Policy (IWRM) for the African Development Bank and was as Team Leader responsible for the preparation of the 'Action Plan for the Implementation of the Nigerian Federal Integrated Water Resources Strategy'.

He carried out project formulations and evaluations and has been a member of WB, EU, AfDB, NEDA, SENTER and NWP-missions for projects in India, Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Nigeria, Chad, Cameroon, Latvia, Brazil and Mexico.

As Environmental Officer for the Holland America Line he was involved in training, environmental audits and environmental management systems.

A complete CV in EU-, WB-, or ADB-format is available on request. E-mail: fdezanger@terraqua.nl
